name: Liquid-O-Ring® 3602
description: Liquid-O-Ring® 3602 is a sulfonated oil that provides fast cooling and cutting capabilities and meets a wide range of anti-weld and lubrication requirements. 3602 Premium Heavy-Duty Cutting Oil provides excellent cooling of cutting tools, thus reducing heat generation and extending tool life. 3602 Premium Heavy-Duty Cutting Oil contains a combination of additives to provide moderate to severe service for fast and smooth metal removal, better surface finish, consistency, and long tool life. 3602 Premium Heavy-Duty Cutting Oil prevents rust, corrosion, and oxidation to finished metal surfaces. The excellent defoaming agents reduce loss of coolant.
